trans-unit.source: The base class for all objects that have dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: La clase base para todos los objetos que tienen las propiedades de dependencia.

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Se debe heredar esta clase.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se implementa en una clase derivada, inicializa una instancia nueva de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa el valor de esta propiedad.

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> type.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, un tipo <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for an event of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un controlador para un evento de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando crea un delegado, identifica el método que controla el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A menos que se quite el delegado, siempre que se produzca el evento se llamará al controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Multiple delegates can be added to handle an event.
trans-unit.target: Se pueden agregar varios delegados para controlar un evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Handlers are added and removed using the following code.
trans-unit.target: Los controladores se agregan y se quitan utilizando el código siguiente.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Send Email SDK sample and is from the SendMailActivity.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte del ejemplo enviar correo electrónico SDK y pertenece al archivo SendMailActivity.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de la actividad enviar correo electrónico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Cualquiera de los argumentos son una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> represents a non-event <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> representa <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> de un no evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether this instance is in design or run-time mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el valor que indica si esta instancia está en diseño o en modo de tiempo de ejecución.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is in design mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si esta instancia está en modo de diseño; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos que usa la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos utilizados por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no utilizados y <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> libera los recursos administrados de forma opcional.

trans-unit.source: Provided as an override to <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> to clean up any unmanaged resources deterministically.
trans-unit.target: Proporcionado como una invalidación para <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> para limpiar los recursos no administrados determinadamente.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is required only when unmanaged resources such as raw HWNDS, Win32 files handlers, and others are released.
trans-unit.target: Generalmente, solo se requiere cuando se liberan recursos no administrados como HWNDS sin formato, controladores de archivos Win32 y otros.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> associated with the specific <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona acceso a la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> asociada a la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> específica.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> associated with the specific <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> asociada a la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> específica.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del destino del <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the subject of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: Recupera el <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que es el asunto de un <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the subject of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que es el asunto de un <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Object> que es el asunto de un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the way in which a specified binding is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, este método se puede utilizar para personalizar la manera en la que se resuelve un enlace especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetType" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned delegates.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de delegados devueltos.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array that contains the delegates for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una matriz que contiene los delegados para el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the delegates for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Una matriz que contiene los delegados para el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> does not correspond to an event.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> no corresponde a un evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the value of the designated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona acceso al valor del <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> designado.

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the value of the designated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: El objeto que representa el valor de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> designada.

trans-unit.source: This member is typically used in property gets to furnish the value of the named dependency value.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro se utiliza generalmente en propiedad y consigue facilitar el valor del valor de dependencia con nombre.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> to return the value represented by a named dependency property in the context of get and set.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código muestra cómo usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> para devolver el valor representado por una propiedad de dependencia con nombre en el contexto de "get" y "set".

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Send Email SDK sample and is from the SendMailActivity.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte del ejemplo enviar correo electrónico SDK y pertenece al archivo SendMailActivity.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de la actividad enviar correo electrónico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to get the value of.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> para obtener el valor.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the bound object of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> and bypasses the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" /> override.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona acceso al objeto enlazado de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> y omite la invalidación de <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" />.

trans-unit.source: The bound object of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: El objeto enlazado de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: This bypasses the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" /> override.
trans-unit.target: Esto omite la invalidación de <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este método es útil dentro de la implementación de invalidación de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override code invokes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValueBase%2A>, and then adds additional code.
trans-unit.target: Generalmente, el código de invalidación de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> invoca al método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValueBase%2A>y, a continuación, agrega el código adicional.

trans-unit.source: For implementing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>/<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> invalidar, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> pueden utilizarse en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> / <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> llamadas.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Realiza la inicialización en propiedades de dependencia cuando se invalida en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine during the initialization of the activity at run time.
trans-unit.target: Llamado por el motor en tiempo de ejecución del flujo de trabajo durante la inicialización de la actividad en tiempo de ejecución.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que se va a probar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> is set as a binding.
trans-unit.target: Indica si el valor de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> se establece como enlace.

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind)" />.
trans-unit.target: Vea <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if set as a binding; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se establece como un enlace; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> to compare with for equality.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> para comparar con igualdad.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see langword="metaproperties" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> equals the <see langword="metaproperties" /> of the parameterized <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina si <see langword="metaproperties" /> de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> iguala <see langword="metaproperties" /> del <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> parametrizado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="metaproperties" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si <see langword="metaproperties" /> son iguales; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This uses the `==` operator as defined for the type of private member `metaproperties`, which is <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Esto utiliza el operador `==` como definido para el tipo de miembro `metaproperties` privado, que es <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> graph.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el elemento primario <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> en el gráfico <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> graph.
trans-unit.target: El elemento primario <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> en el gráfico <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa el valor de esta propiedad.

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> type.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, un tipo <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes an <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> from an associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Quita <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> de un <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: Provided as a convenient direct method for removing an event delegate.
trans-unit.target: Proporcionado como un método directo conveniente para quitar un delegado de eventos.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado, identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A menos que se quite el delegado, siempre que se produzca el evento se llamará al controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Handlers are added and removed using the following code.
trans-unit.target: Los controladores se agregan y se quitan utilizando el código siguiente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [ejemplo de la actividad enviar correo electrónico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Cualquiera de los argumentos son una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> is not an event.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> no es un evento.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> and this instance is not in <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> es un <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> y está instancia no está en <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Quita un objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if operation was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el resultado de la operación es correcto; en el caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The argument is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: El argumento es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> to set to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> que se va a establecer.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />para el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> sets the value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> establece el valor directamente para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event.
trans-unit.target: De igual forma, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> agrega directamente un controlador a las propiedades de evento de tipo.

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: Estos métodos son exclusivos cuando se piden la misma propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> is called, then the values previously set using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: Si se llama <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>, a continuación, se descartan los valores previamente establecidos utilizando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> en eventos).

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El mismo es verdadero al revés: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) restablece el enlace asignado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.CanModifyActivities%2A> permission for this type.
trans-unit.target: El código siguiente muestra cómo crear las actividades y agregarlas como elementos secundarios a una actividad compuesta e incluye el establecimiento del permiso de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.CanModifyActivities%2A> para este tipo.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the use of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> method is illustrated.
trans-unit.target: Además, se muestra el uso del método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código es parte de la muestra Throw SDK y pertenece al archivo ThrowWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Throw](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [usando produce](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc).

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Cualquiera de los argumentos son una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> is not bindable.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> asociada a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> no se puede enlazar.

trans-unit.source: This instance is not in <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.
trans-unit.target: Esta instancia no está en <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to set the target of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Object" />para establecer el destino de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the target <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece el valor del <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />de destino.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bind" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bind" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa el valor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />, which is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Establece el valor de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que es de solo lectura.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to be set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que hay que establecer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to set the value to.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que va a establecer el valor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to the object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el valor de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> al objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> sets a binding for the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> establece un enlace para la propiedad de dependencia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> sets a value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> (similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> establece un valor directamente para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> (de forma similar, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> agrega un controlador directamente a las propiedades del evento de tipo).

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: Estos métodos son exclusivos cuando se piden la misma propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> is called, then the values previously set using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: Si se llama <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>, a continuación, se descartan los valores previamente establecidos utilizando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> en eventos).

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El mismo es verdadero al revés: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) restablece el enlace asignado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how a dependency property is set within a dependency object using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El código siguiente muestra cómo una propiedad de dependencia se establece dentro de un objeto de dependencia utilizando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to be set to the <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> para establecer a <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that becomes the value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que se convierte en el valor de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />, bypassing the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece el valor de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> para la clase <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificada, omitiendo <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este método es útil dentro de la implementación de invalidación de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override code would do some custom logic before calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValueBase%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Generalmente, el código de invalidación de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> usaría la lógica personalizada antes de llamar al método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValueBase%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For setting a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para establecer una invalidación de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>, se puede utilizar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> o llamadas de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> component of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una referencia al componente <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> component of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: El componente <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> del <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that associates custom data with this class instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que asocia los datos personalizados a esta instancia de clase.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that acts as an extensibility hook for developers to manipulate <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> declarations for a design tool and associate custom data with individual activity declarations.
trans-unit.target: Un diccionario que actúa como un enlace de la extensibilidad para que los programadores manipulen las declaraciones <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> para una herramienta de diseño y asocien los datos personalizados con declaraciones de actividad individuales.

trans-unit.source: This property is a `metaproperty`, which means it is immutable at run time.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es una `metaproperty`, lo que significa que es inmutable en tiempo de ejecución.

trans-unit.source: `Metaproperties` do not change after a property instance is created at run time, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.
trans-unit.target: `Metaproperties` No cambie después de que se crea una instancia de la propiedad en tiempo de ejecución, por lo que la propiedad debe establecerse en un valor literal en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: This property is not used in the default <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> declaration implementations provided by Windows Workflow Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no se utiliza en las implementaciones de declaración <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> predeterminadas proporcionadas por Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: This collection is not serialized; data that the collection contains is not persisted from design time to run time.
trans-unit.target: Esta colección no se serializa. Los datos que la colección contiene no se conservan del tiempo de diseño al tiempo de ejecución.
